system.requirements: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, Da Nekst Best Fing
system.effect:
When Determining Bonus Psy Rating from Power of Da Waaagh! Every two Friendly Non-Orks who do not have the Machine Trait, are not Wild Animals, or a Lesser Orkoid such as Squigs, Snotlings, or Gretchins, within 5 metres counts as a single Ork.
Additionally, any of the Character's Beneficial Psychic Powers that only affected Orks can now affect Non-Orks (But still not Lesser Orkoids).

description.value: When Determining Bonus Psy Rating from Power of Da Waaagh! Every two Friendly Non-Orks who do not have the Machine Trait, are not Wild Animals, or a Lesser Orkoid such as Squigs, Snotlings, or Gretchins, within 5 metres counts as a single Ork. Additionally, any of the Character's Beneficial Psychic Powers that only affected Orks can now affect Non-Orks (But still not Lesser Orkoids).
